content: DGH 130-22 Cordless concrete grinder Cordless concrete grinder with brushless motor for grinding concrete joints and finishing surfaces (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Grinders and sanders- - - ### FEATURES:Features No more extension cords – revolutionary Nuron batteries powering an efficient brushless motor make the DGH 130-22 our most mobile, efficient solution for everyday grinding and finishing tasks, especially when combined with the VC 4X-22 T15 cordless vacuum Save time and labor – cordless diamond grinding tools minimize your setup time, while six-step speed adjustment helps you grind as fast as the workpiece allows Improved comfort and control – slimline grip and padded head help you maintain control when working in virtually any position, especially overhead Safer jobsites – no extension cord means no tripping hazard, while a built-in vacuum connector facilitates virtually dustless grinding, and drop detection function shuts down the motor if the tool slips from your grip On the Nuron battery platform – cordless concrete grinding tools without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries, energy-saving cup wheels and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Applications Grinding concrete walls and ceilings to remove formwork marks Polishing visible concrete walls Grinding chamfers into concrete edges ### TECHNICAL DATA: Rated voltage: 22 V Disc diameter: 5-1/8 in Tool body weight: 4.4 lb. Technical Data | Rated voltage | 22 V | Disc diameter | 5-1/8 in | Tool body weight | 4.4 lb | No load RPM | gear 1: 3000 rpm; gear 2: 3650 rpm; gear 3: 4440 rpm; gear 4: 5400 rpm; gear 5: 6190 rpm; gear 6: 8000 rpm | Trigger type | lockable on / off | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 13.8 x 8 x 6 in ### ITEMS- 2358495 - Cordl. concrete grinder DGH 130-22 DLX - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DGH 130-22 Cordl. concrete grinder - 2x 130 SPX Fast Dia. polishing disc - 2x 130 SPX Fine Dia. polishing disc - 2x 130 SPX Extra Fine Dia. polishing disc - 1x 125/5 SPX Diamond cup wheel turbo A - 1x Backing pad - 1x DGH 130-22 Tool case assy - 2358490 - Cordl. concrete grinder DGH 130-22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x DGH 130-22 Cordl. concrete grinder - 1x 125/5 SPX Diamond cup wheel turbo A
